content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(x=-22.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=-22.0, y=-50.0) and a wooden chest at position(x=-21.5, y=-48.5)

### Iron plate smelting at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=-14.5, y=-51.5) that puts into furnace
- Wooden chest (position x=-14.5, y=-52.5) that is the target of inserter

### Transport belt system at position(x=-19.5, y=-47.5)
Consists of following entities
- BeltGroup(inputs=[Belt((x=-19.5 y=-47.5) -> (x=-17.5 y=-47.5), direction=Direction.RIGHT)], outputs=[Belt((x=-16.5 y=-47.5) -> (x=-14.5 y=-47.5), direction=Direction.RIGHT)], inventory={}, status=EntityStatus.EMPTY, belts=[4 belts])
- BeltGroup(inputs=[Belt((x=-19.5 y=-46.5) -> (x=-19.5 y=-48.5), direction=Direction.UP)], outputs=[Belt((x=-19.5 y=-47.5) -> (x=-18.5 y=-48.5), direction=Direction.RIGHT)], inventory={}, status=EntityStatus.EMPTY, belts=[2 belts])

### Chest at position(x=-13.5, y=-49.5)
Consists of following entities
- Wooden chest (position x=-13.5, y=-49.5)
- Transport belt (position x=-13.5 y=-49.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when placing entities and being too far
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum placement distance is 10.

### Errors when getting entities at a position
- Ensure that there is an entity of the specified type at the given position before attempting to get it.

# NAMESPACE
```
